Vim Screenshot


Here is a screenshot while working with Vim. I know it will look geeky to many of you, but to me it feels really cool. I split Vim's work-area into three parts. The right pane is the CSS file. The left again has two parts, top-jquery code, bottom- the html.

Tell me how it looks to you guys.
